title.rendered: Bleu Diamond Case Study: How this Delivery Service Generated a Big Buzz

content.rendered:
We love working with locally-owned and operated businesses — such as The Central Coast’s Bleu Diamond — and helping them get the most out of their marketing efforts. We were proud to work with Bleu Diamond, helping them with content creation, lifestyle/product photography, videography, search engine optimization, reputation management, and website design/development. When in the Central Coast, be sure to check them out if you’re looking for high-quality cannabis products, speedy delivery, and exceptional customer service.

Website Design

To improve Bleu Diamond‘s online image, the first thing we did was build them a better website. Not only is it easy on the eyes, it’s packed with user-friendly functionality, “Call Now” buttons, mailing list sign-up forms, and reputation management built in, making their website a marketing engine of it’s own!

Email List Building

With Bleu Diamond‘s website designed, we started collecting customer and visitor email addresses. We quickly grew their subscribers list from 7,498 to 12,532 in under 6 months!

Before
After

Reputation Management

Since January 1, 2022, We helped increase Bleu Diamond’s Google Reviews from 59 to 193 and their WeedMaps Reviews from 264 to 750. Our reputation management services include a software we’ve developed to automatically ask customers for reviews, redirecting the positive ones to Google and blocking the negative ones.

Before
After

Photography

An important part of marketing that is often overlooked is Photography. Humans are proven to be highly visual creatures, possessing the ability to process images over 60,000 times faster than text. So, there is truth in the old saying “a picture is worth a thousand words”

Videography

Videos are a great way to show people who you are and what you’re about. A high-quality video can build trust quickly between brands and their target audience. Whether your goal is to introduce your brand or influence your audience purchase your products, Nacho’s high-quality video production services can help!

Email Marketing

We create emails that get opened and, more importantly, drive leads!

Social Media

Since January 1, 2022, We helped increase Bleu Diamond’s Instagram Following  from 12.6k to 18.4k

Branding and Packaging

From high quality vector logo design to fully compliant, print-ready, packaging. Your brand will be ready for anything.

Don't just take my word for it...

“Nacho is our secret weapon for Marketing and Content Creation. Keeping up with the latest trends, along with cannabis regulations, we are always 10 steps ahead of our competition. Nacho Agency is AWESOME!”

Kevin Harris
Manager, Bleu Diamond
805-440-6636
kevin.harris@officialbleu.com

Can you handle more customers?

YES! LET'S GET STARTED

If not, we might not be a good fit.
